messages.subject: You'll be sorry...
messages.msgSnippet: Learn Nothing Day is two months away.  I have art and humor to distribute, some good things from past years to revisit, and a blog to keep it on. What I have
messages.messageBody:
Learn Nothing Day is two months away. I have art and humor to distribute, some good things from past years to revisit, and a blog to keep it on.

What I have learned, though, is that the videos don't show on some phones, or iPads. So tomorrow, please go here to see a video:

http://learnnothingday.blogspot.com

And if you subscribe to the blog and look on a device that won't show videos, please try from a computer.

Most entries are photos and that won't be a problem.

I'm also putting older Learn Nothing Day links and art, from years' past, so it can be easily found and browsed.

If any of what you see there inspires you to create some art or write a testimonial or design a good plan for learning nothing, let me know!

There are two videos already, though, and another coming tomorrow.

Sandra
